message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product. I'm sure it will be a great asset to you.  I'm asking $18,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $15,000?
Bob, I understand your budget, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this product. How about $16,500? This is a good deal for both of us!
Thanks for your response, Alice. I still feel that we might be able to come to an agreement closer to my budget. Could you consider $15,000 as a final offer?
